::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod flips around, trying to avoid the daggers, but three hit him, in
the mid body area.
"Aaaaaarrrr!!" Hot Rod fights the pain, and jumps behind Alpha.
He then shoots a rocket, right at the back of Alpha's head.
"You havn't seen anything yet!"
